About

I'm Ian - also known as SanCoca online. Dutch-Australian software engineer and game developer based in the real world, building things that work.

I've been writing code since I was a kid and never really stopped. I build websites, games, tools, and whatever else needs building. If there's a problem, I solve it. If there's a thing that should exist, I make it.

Dev Side

Software engineering, AI agents, game development, technical deep-dives. The stuff that pays the bills and keeps the brain sharp.

Life Side

Cooking, baking, bunny rescue, voice acting, crafts, and whatever else I'm into. The stuff that keeps me human.

How I work

Direct. No-nonsense. I'd rather ship something good today than talk about shipping something perfect next quarter. If you want meetings about meetings, I'm the wrong person. If you want stuff done - let's go.

Get in touch

Find me online as SanCoca or reach out at ian@ianhogers.com.

Same person, different modes. Pick your side, or read both.
